properties.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn; Red Lodge Foothills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 11:30PM MST until February 10 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Occasional snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to locally 5
inches.

* WHERE...Red Lodge Foothills, Southern Big Horn and Bighorn
Canyon.

* WHEN...Until noon MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and areas of poor
visibility. This includes travel on US-212 near Red Lodge, I-90
near Lodge Grass and Aberdeen Hill, and Highway 313 from Saint
Xavier to Fort Smith.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST MONDAY
